_meta.purpose: Summary of hypothetical artifacts formalization and governance compliance verification

state_advancement.verification: All artifacts explicitly verify they do NOT advance legislative state. System remains in INTRO_EVT.

review_gate_satisfaction.verification: All artifacts explicitly verify they do NOT satisfy review gates. HR_PRE remains APPROVED (for PRE_CONCEPT only). HR_LANG remains NOT_STARTED.

execution_authorization.verification: All artifacts explicitly verify they do NOT authorize execution. execution_outreach_comm_evt remains BLOCKED.

real_data_usage.verification: All artifacts explicitly verify no real actors, committees, bill numbers, member names, or dates are used. All content is fictional.

committee_referral_assumption.verification: All COMM_EVT artifacts explicitly verify they do NOT assume committee_referral has occurred. Committee referral remains PENDING.

system_modification.verification: All artifacts explicitly verify they do NOT modify agent-registry.json, hr_*_queue.json files, or legislative-state.json.

disclaimer_compliance.disclaimer_text_standard: This artifact is fictional and for development reference only. It does not represent real data, authorized actions, or system state.
disclaimer_compliance.verification: All artifacts include explicit disclaimers stating fictional nature and development-only purpose.

filename_compliance.verification: All artifact filenames include 'HYPOTHETICAL' prefix to clearly indicate placeholder status.

metadata_compliance.verification: All artifacts have proper metadata fields indicating hypothetical, read-only, non-authoritative status.

scaffolding_purpose.development_reference: These artifacts serve as structured reference scaffolding for future phases
scaffolding_purpose.planning_tool: Agents and developers can reference these structures when planning for INTRO_EVT and COMM_EVT phases
scaffolding_purpose.template_demonstration: Artifacts demonstrate expected structure and content for optional and required artifacts
scaffolding_purpose.governance_example: Artifacts demonstrate proper governance compliance and safety verification patterns

system_state_preservation.verification: All system state remains unchanged. No modifications to state files, registries, or review queues.

constraints_observed.verification: All mandatory constraints have been observed. No prohibited modifications were made.

summary.purpose: These artifacts provide structured, compliant development scaffolding for future phases (INTRO_EVT optional and COMM_EVT required artifacts). They serve as reference templates and planning tools without affecting system state or implying authorization.

disclaimer: This summary document confirms the formalization of hypothetical artifacts for development scaffolding purposes. All artifacts are fictional, read-only, and do not represent system state, real data, or authorized actions.
